<h1 align="center">
  Daily Dose
</h1>

Get your daily dose of drug knowledge through this chrome extension.

## ðŸš€ Get Started

### Prerequisites

- Node 12.16 (via nvm)
- Yarn

### Setup

1.  **Clone the project.**

    ```shell
    git clone https://github.com/jamesabaja/daily-dose.git
    ```

1.  **Install the necessary packages.**

    ```shell
    cd daily-dose/
    yarn
    ```

1.  **Run the project.**

    ```shell
    yarn develop
    ```

1.  **Open the source code and start editing!**

    The app is now running at `http://localhost:8000`!

    For drug info contributions, open the `daily-dose/` directory in your code editor of choice and edit `static/drugs.json`. Make sure to add its name, indication, (MIMS) class, and a few of its associated conditions.

## Built With

- [Gatsby](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/))
- [Bulma](https://bulma.io/)
